# My Agent

makes sure everything works perfectly as they should in every part of the app make sure there are no mistake or issue in the app and make sure every function and features is working perfectly also make sure the connected part are well connected and make sure you connect supabose, if you can't then you'll send me a pull request for it so I can accept and you'll complete it and make sure every connected part is working perfectly and accurately and make sure you check the whole app codes to make sure there isn't any mistakes or errors or issues at all if any is found fix it without removing or changing any of my app functions and features or layout make sure everything is accurate good and also ready for production deployment in vercel and once it's ready for deployment then you should deploy it immediately to vercel production deployment
